snippet: They were the latest of seven people detained after the attack, French news media said, as the 84 deaths were marked on the second of three days of national mourning....
abstract: French police arrest three more people in connection with massacre in Nice, bringing total number of suspects in custody to seven, as country observes second of three days of mourning.
lead_paragraph: They were the latest of seven people detained after the attack, French news media said, as the 84 deaths were marked on the second of three days of national mourning.

headline.main: 3 More Reported Held in Bastille Day Truck Attack in Nice
headline.print_headline: 3 More Reported Held in French Truck Attack,Bringing the Total to 7

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
